div.p: Flag_of_Latvia.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 600 pixels, file size: 221 B)

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:28, 20 June 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 04:20, 14 October 2009 (the Pantone colors were fixed))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 00:05, 20 June 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 04:20, 14 October 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 00:28, 16 February 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 18:07, 15 April 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 17:06, 15 January 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 21:53, 10 January 2007

td.span: (The Ministry of Culture provided images to use to make the flag, so I use the colors from http://www.km.gov.lv/UI/main.asp?id=12781 to make the new image.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:15, 23 September 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 18:20, 14 February 2006

td.span: (readd some of the "useless" parts from weel-formedness)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:42, 8 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 02:01, 5 October 2005

td.span: (A user said the flag colors was still incorrect and said to use the colors at http://www.li.lv/en/?id=37. The RGB is 148-16-24.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:43, 3 October 2005

td.span: (change red to RGB(153,0,15) according to http://www.fotw.net/flags/lv.html)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:22, 28 September 2005
Thumbnail for version as of 05:14, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Latvia. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Latvia)
